thread.section_title: Villa Beaumarchais - UPDATED 2016 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Quiet, friendly hotel
thread.title_full: Quiet, friendly hotel - Review of Villa Beaumarchais, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Chris s
title: Quiet, friendly hotel
text:
A quaint, quiet and friendly hotel. A little tired in some bedroom furnishings but very clean. Bedroom we used was small but perfectly adequate. Would recommend for a short/weekend break.
Pleasant and helpful staff.
Off the main boulevard but close to the nearest Metro. Local shops and Marais very interesting as is the antique/curio market every day except Monday.
